name: HelloTxt
tag_list: hellotxt, twitter, facebook, status-manager, microblogging, social-networking, web-aggregator, real-time-web, lifestream, time-management
overview:
Hellotxt is your personal social networkerâ€¦a free tool to aid you in the communication and digestion of all your online information. We make it easy to post text and media to separate accounts on multiple social networks, publishing platforms, and micro-communication services from the web, or by your mobile (WAP, Android, iPhone). Hellotxt works with the worldâ€™s most popular social networking and web 2.0 sites, including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Hi5, Bebo, MySpace, Blogger, and WordPress. Use Hellotxt to organize your updates, by group, or network, across the entire social web! With Hellotxt, updating whomever you want, whenever you want is easy and fun! Doodle on top of a photo before posting (iPhone/iPad)! Update your friends with your location or nearby point of interest (iPhone/iPad)! Hellotxt was launched in 2007, and is currently a part of the new business line of mobile entertainment leader Buongiorno SpA.

via: HelloTxt
